entry.title: Sunday: Light snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Light snow ending late this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill near minus 23. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear near midnight. Fog patches developing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023
